titles: To the churches of Jesus throughout the world gathered and setled in His eternal light, power, and spirit, to be one holy flock, family, and houshold to the Lord : who hath redeemed them from among all the kindreds of the earth : Godly zeal, wisdom, power, perseverance, and victory, with all heavenly blessings, be multiplied among you in the name of the Lord / William Penn.
author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
notes: Smith, J. Friends' books, v. 2, p. 295.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
